metadata.description:
The QVerse is a total collection of 100 unique 1/1 characters. 4 different drops of 20 NFTs each and another 20 NFTs that can be unlocked for free, by collectors. The characters are a combination of 4 basic archetypes (Heroes, Leaders, Shadows, and Creators) each specifically identified by the symbol on the bottom right of the NFT and in the metadata. By collecting 4 NFT with different verses symbols, a special legendary NFT can be unlocked at no extra cost. The QVerse is a world of heroes, shadows, and characters that are intricately intertwined in a very unique way. Future benefits and perks can be unlocked by the community through roadmap activations on the Qverse website or on our Discord
Each character is a 1/1 handcrafted by magdiellop
metadata.name: Boff
